Title: Hogan Is My Grandfather
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Marc Firek, Lauren Bans (executive story editor), Matt Mira (executive story editor), Erik Weiner (executive story editor), Aaron Kaczander (story editor)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Adam's school project about pops backfires while Beverly teaches an important lesson to Erica and Barry.
